item.title: Hi
item.description: I grew up and lived most of my life on the island of Newfoundland which is easily the best place on the planet. The people, the land, the sea, the culture - it’s such a special place to call home. I got my B.Sc. studying computer science at Memorial University in St. John’s. I wasn’t great at school but I loved it and worked hard. In 2016 I moved to Ontario to work for Shopify where I’m now an engineering manager so that worked out pretty well.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Yeah I might actually use this to write about things.
